dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Cum privilegio decem annorum." Appears in Blaeu's Novus atlas. Includes inset of Greenland, note, and ill., including portraits of native Americans and views of chief cities forming border on 3 sides. German text on verso; signature E.
rights_statement_s:
No Known Copyright
